reports.title: My Issues
reports.subtitle: issues reported
reports.noIssuesMessage: You haven't reported any issues yet. Tap the button below to report your first issue.

helpSupport.title: Help & Support
helpSupport.subtitle: Get help and contact our support team
helpSupport.callDescription: Speak directly with our support team
helpSupport.emailDescription: Send us an email with your query
helpSupport.websiteDescription: Visit our official website for more information

faqQuestions.howToReport: How do I report an issue?
faqQuestions.howToTrack: How can I track my reported issues?
faqQuestions.notResolved: What if my issue is not resolved?
faqQuestions.locationAccuracy: How accurate is the location tracking?
faqQuestions.addPhotos: Can I add photos to my reports?

faqAnswers.howToReport: Tap the "Report Issue" button on the home screen and fill out the form with details about the problem. Include photos and location for better assistance.
faqAnswers.howToTrack: Go to "My Issues" in your profile to see all your reported issues and their current status. You'll receive updates on progress.
faqAnswers.notResolved: You can follow up on your issue or contact support directly using the contact options above. We're here to help!
faqAnswers.locationAccuracy: We use GPS and network-based location services to accurately pinpoint issue locations. You can also manually adjust the location if needed.
faqAnswers.addPhotos: Yes! Photos help us better understand the issue. You can take new photos or select from your gallery when reporting.

about.appDescription: The Civic Issue Reporter app is an initiative by the Government of Jharkhand to enable citizens to report civic issues directly to the concerned departments. This digital platform bridges the gap between citizens and government services, ensuring faster resolution of civic problems.

features.reportIssues: • Report civic issues with photos and location

about.mission: Committed to transparent governance and citizen-centric services for the development of Jharkhand.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Government of Jharkhand - Civic Issue Reporter
privacyPolicy.introText: This Privacy Policy explains how the Government of Jharkhand collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our Civic Issue Reporter application. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data.
privacyPolicy.dataCollectionText: We collect information you provide when reporting civic issues, including:
privacyPolicy.dataUsageText: Your data is used exclusively for:

dataItems.location: Location data for accurate issue mapping

privacyPolicy.dataProtection: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties
privacyPolicy.securityText: We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your information:

securityItems.storage: Secure cloud storage with regular backups

privacyPolicy.retentionText: We retain your personal data for the following periods:

retentionItems.accounts: User account data: Until account deletion

privacyPolicy.rightsText: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacyPolicy.rightsContact: Contact us through support channels for any privacy-related concerns
privacyPolicy.cookiesText: Our app may use cookies and similar technologies to:
privacyPolicy.contactInfoText: For privacy-related questions or concerns, please contact us:
privacyPolicy.updatesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.subtitle: Government of Jharkhand - Civic Issue Reporter
termsOfService.introText: Welcome to the Government of Jharkhand Civic Issue Reporter application. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our mobile application and services. By using our app, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
termsOfService.acceptanceText: By accessing and using this application, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
termsOfService.useLicenseText: Permission is granted to temporarily use the Civic Issue Reporter application for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

useProhibitions.commercialUse: Use the materials for any commercial purpose
useProhibitions.reverseEngineer: Attempt to reverse engineer any software
useProhibitions.removeNotices: Remove any copyright or proprietary notations

termsOfService.userResponsibilitiesIntro: As a user of this application, you agree to:

userResponsibilitiesList.legitimateUse: Use the app only for legitimate civic issues
userResponsibilitiesList.respectOthers: Respect other users and government officials
userResponsibilitiesList.noFalseReports: Not submit false or misleading reports
userResponsibilitiesList.accountConfidentiality: Maintain the confidentiality of your account

termsOfService.prohibitedUsesIntro: You may not use our application:

prohibitedUsesList.unlawful: For any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to perform unlawful acts
prohibitedUsesList.regulationBreach: To violate any international, federal, provincial, or state regulations, rules, laws, or local ordinances
prohibitedUsesList.ipInfringement: To infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others
prohibitedUsesList.harassment: To harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate
prohibitedUsesList.falseInfo: To submit false or misleading information

termsOfService.contentIPText: The application and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of the Government of Jharkhand and its licensors. The application is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws.
termsOfService.contentIPNote: By submitting content, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, modify, and distribute your content for the purpose of addressing civic issues.
termsOfService.privacyAndDataText: Your privacy is important to us. Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our application. By using our application, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.serviceAvailabilityText: We strive to provide continuous service availability, but we do not guarantee that the application will be available at all times. We may experience hardware, software, or other problems or need to perform maintenance related to the application, resulting in interruptions, delays, or errors.
termsOfService.limitationOfLiabilityText: In no event shall the Government of Jharkhand, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of the application.
termsOfService.terminationText: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the application immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever and without limitation, including but not limited to a breach of the Terms.
termsOfService.governingLawText: These Terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of India and the state of Jharkhand, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights.
termsOfService.contactIntro: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
termsOfService.changesText: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.

complaint.developmentBuildDesc:
To use real voice recognition:

1. Run: npx expo run:android
2. Install on physical device
3. Grant microphone permission

This creates a development build with native voice recognition.
complaint.voiceInputCompleteDesc: Your speech has been converted to text. You can edit it if needed.
complaint.microphoneAccessDenied: Microphone access denied. Please allow microphone permission.
complaint.noSpeechDetected: No speech detected. Please try again.
complaint.couldNotStartVoice: Could not start voice recognition. Please try the sample text option.
